commands.name: search-css-variables
commands.title: Search CSS Variables
commands.description: Search and copy CSS custom properties from your CSS file

preferences.name: cssFilePath
preferences.title: CSS File Path
preferences.description: Path to the CSS file containing custom properties

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
